dimension - The dimension.

intersection

public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry intersection(Coordinates lineStart,
                                                                Coordinates lineEnd,
                                                                com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line)
Get the portion of the line segment between c1 and c2 which intersects the line string geometry. If there is no intersection null will be returned, otherwise a point, line, multi-point, multi-line, or multi-geometry containing point and lines depending on what intersections occur.

Parameters:
lineStart - The coordinates of the start of the segment.
lineEnd - The coordinates of the end of the segment
line - The line to intersect.
Returns:
The geometry of the intersection.

merge

public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString merge(Coordinates point,
                                                           com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line1,
                                                           com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line2)

merge

public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString merge(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line1,
                                                           com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line2)
Merge two lines that share common coordinates at either the start or end. If the lines touch only at their start coordinates, the line2 will be reversed and joined before the start of line1. If the two lines touch only at their end coordinates, the line2 will be reversed and joined after the end of line1.

Parameters:
line1 - The first line.
line2 - The second line.
Returns:
The new line string

reverse

public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString reverse(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line)
